website_summaries.verdict: HP's Omen X 25f offers up just about everything you should expect from a high-refresh gaming monitor in 2019. It falls short of greatness in areas that will matter to a subset of ergonomically minded gamers.
cons: So-so color reproduction in some tests
HP's software control panel not as function-rich as the hardware OSD

customer_reviews.title: Comes with an HDMI cable which only allows 60hz
customer_reviews.text: This monitor comes with an HDMI cable which doesnt support 144hz. I think that if it costs £180, a £10 cable should probably be included. With an HDMI cable, you are only able to use it with 60hz. A Display port cable allows you to use the monitor with its actual full potential. Please include that cable with this order. Now I need to wait another 4 days until the right cable arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Monitor looks great before you even set it up.. Once your going with a Display Port, the 144hz is revolutionary, immediately noticeable difference compared with 60hz, even on the desktop. Games are running perfect along with the monitor. Please just remember to activate game mode/freesync in the monitor settings, otherwise you'll be running in 60hz.
customer_reviews.author: Usman Naz

customer_reviews.title: G SYNC  !COMPATIBLE !  NOT A G SYNC
customer_reviews.text: ITS not a G-SYNC monitor ... ( you need at least nvidia 10 series gpu to use the " G-sync" this monitor is g sync compatible so what it means that is not as good as Real G SYNC . I am returning the item because of false advertising .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Slomion

customer_reviews.title: Gaming Monitor 144MHz
customer_reviews.text: Very Adjustable Gaming Monitor. Works with my Nvidia 2070 Super OC 8GB. There is no Flickering. Runs at 144MHz in 2560x1440 Res. 1ms Response time is True. Love the Sleek design. I recommend to any Gamer. Looking for Decent Size monitor. I spent Hours looking and comparing the only next step up from this monitor is a 4k one but prices are through the roof. Get This!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Son very pleased .
customer_reviews.text: I have one very happy boy . Picture quality great for gaming and no lagging on the picture . You do need to buy speakers though for sound for the pc if you don’t already have them .
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Worked great - until it broke, twice
customer_reviews.text: I had a great first two weeks with this product, it was exactly what I wanted - a great quality, bright gaming monitor. However, within the first two weeks of owning it, it went pop, then started to smell like burning, unsurprisingly it wouldn't turn on again after that. I thought this would be a one off and elected to get a replacement from Amazon. Nope. 2 days after recieving the replacement, horizontal lines on the bottom of the monitor appeared, the line have slowly gone across more of the monitor over the course of a day. 0/5 Obviously some massive manufactuaring / quality issues with this device. I would recommend it to no one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing as long as you dont get a faulty one.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for gaming and office work, the monitor is really good for value. But I'm really dissatisfied with what happened after 3 days of use. There is an unusual circle flow or smudge on the screen when black or dark images appear. Luckily amazon are replacing it. If the new one comes and is ok then defo will say a fabulous screen. The size is amazing especially in 1440p lots of multitasking advantages and gaming. Using a 5700xt and boy does it perform great on this. As long as it's not faulty, it's all good. Buy from amazon they'll replace if theres an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf Abdurraheem

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: The G-Sync is the key part of this monitor. It has great refresh rate which you will notice automatically at pumping up those scores. I previously played on a 4K TV and found I was getting killed a lot within the game when other players were using a monitor. Once this bad boy was turned on to say the tables had turned was an understatement. All round this is a great gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Luke73

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality QHD monitor, used for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my gaming computer, it works really well, the screen itself is plenty bright and reproduces colour well, the 144hz allows for a smoother gaming experience. If I had to complain about anything it is the manual being a little light on information, some settings in the menu need a google before understanding what they do exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Lynden Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great value Gsync and Freesync 144 Hz monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great value, the only one I could find in it's price range with Gsync and freesync. Sharp picture, I enjoy it a lot with MW Warzone, yo can feel the difference of the extra fps when moving the camera around. No ghosting or vertical synchronisation issues.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Isern

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Very good 24” monitor with a good solid adjustable stand that can be turned vertically or horizontal. It came with a standard hdmi cable instead of a Display port cable which is what you need for Gsync but other than that I’ve had no issues. 4 stars in gaming because I would recommend a bigger screen for gaming but this thing is still is still pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rayman167

customer_reviews.title: Cant blame fps for bad shots anymore
customer_reviews.text: Good quality monitor with simple weighted adjustable stand. Great price for a 144hz monitor and has better colours than my previous, but check the specs for actual ratings. The OSD is the more or less same standard one you get on all HP monitors from 10 years ago. The green accent is there if you want, but i have turned it off
customer_reviews.author: qwerty23

customer_reviews.title: very bad product for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor coming from a 60hz ips which i bought for £120, and did so for the 144hz capabilities. I was looking forward to this as I am a big gamer however i have just received it and tried it and the colours on it are atrocious. The blacks are greys literally and for some reason it hurt my eyes. The speakers on it are also really bad. I would NOT recommend buying this product as there are much better alternatives on the market for a considerably less price.
customer_reviews.author: Tharak Miah

customer_reviews.title: Good with flaws
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice monitor but be aware: It’s TN panel so the backlight leaks through The LCD screen so you don’t get good blacks. Some games don’t work properly when the response time is set to 1m/s, you’ll see a lot of graphical glitching. No speakers or USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: R. Maines

customer_reviews.title: Expectations sadly not met
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor... For 6 weeks, then just a permanent white screen at power-on. Not cables, tried with both hdmi and DisplayPort. No access to on-screen controls, other than power button, all others unresponsive. No 'no input signal detected' with nothing attached. Returning for refund, not interested in a replacement, faith in HP tarnished.
customer_reviews.author: Spot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for gaming, right price, right performance
customer_reviews.text: I got this monitor for my 17th birthday, as i'd been wanting one for a while. Every other monitor i could find was too expensive and the bezel's were too wide. This monitor comes right out of the box to be able to run 100hz with the included HDMI cable, but if you want to unlock the 144hz capability, youll need to order a DisplayPort cable. Other than this, there is nothing else wrong with this product. Excellent brightness and clarity for the price!
customer_reviews.author: JIC

customer_reviews.title: Height and angle adjust .
customer_reviews.text: I like this monitor for its fullscreen design which has a very thin frame so basically the picture goes all the way to the edge giving you a full-screen effect. Also, its height and angle adjustment and clarity auto-setup mean its plug and play. I haven't played much with the settings yet but so far so good. Its got a suttle green light at the base of the screen which for me is nice as its quite relaxing on the eyes particularly when the room is quite dark. So, all in all, it gets a full 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shane lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Really good monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really good monitor that I am currently using in a 2 screen set up, also came with a display port cable. Brightness takes some set up and so does the 144hz options ensure that you play about in your display settings to get the most out of the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Wanted a monitor for my Xbox One X. After spending ages looking at different monitors for different prices, settled for this! 24” - perfect for gaming. 1ms response time - amazing. Built in speakers - annoying to change the volume when I don’t want to where my headset whilst watching something! Overall 10/10! Would buy again without a doubt! Great value and looks really sleek in person!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for price!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely good the refresh rate is high and stands to its snake it is a perfect size and is excellent when it comes to gaming it’s 144hz and does have Nvidia sync which is great for pc gaming you can adjust the settings to fit your needs and it’s and all around great monitor
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Leanne M Alanson

customer_reviews.title: This monitors Insane!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this monitor. Coming from a 24inch 60hz walker tv this monitor is a complete game changer. The ultra smoothness and 1 to 1 response time makes this insane. Perfect price also. Wish it came with a display port cable though. Other than that this was one of my best investments in a long time. Thanks HP!
customer_reviews.author: Fearghal h.

customer_reviews.title: Very  good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for work and gaming. Im very very pleased with look and picture quality.This monitor definitely worth to buy,only thing that you need to take in consideration it have no speakers.That not a big deal but I missed that when bought it. But no regrets. For money I paid highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitrij Melnikov

customer_reviews.title: Great 240hz 2k monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor looks great, the panel is good for a TN panel. The response time is very good for a 2k monitor great for 240 hz gaming. Only problem is that the frame has a few scratches on the side but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels light the night sky...
customer_reviews.text: Thought the reviews of dead pixels were few enough it wouldn't happen; the screen was spattered with them. Very disappointed as this could be a great budget monitor but the price and features come at the cost of built quality, or lack thereof...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kelly

customer_reviews.title: LED does not work
customer_reviews.text: We have received this monotor today for work purposes, and this first day I must say it work well. HOWEVER, I am not happy to say that the green LED on the case of the monitor is not working. Even though this is something which presumably does not interfere in the quality of the screen, it is unfair I have paid for a new monitos and the LED is broken.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDIA CUENCA

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor but stupid sellers
customer_reviews.text: I just got this monitor and it performs very well, unfortunately, despite being a UK based celler, the seller delivered it with a European Power Adaptor, meaning it was unusable in the UK without buying a replacement adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: Flynn R.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Upon Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The monitor was damaged upon delivery and you could clearly see on the box that it had been dropped. There was scuffing and cracks on the side of the monitor and there were deadpixels on the bottom left side of the monitor. The monitor itself, if you did not get it damaged, is really good for gaming since you get 144hz on an ips display as well as g-sync and freesync.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: arrived with the wrong plug but company offered to help
customer_reviews.text: Didnt have a uk plug, but after reaching out the company they have offered to cover the cost of a new cable. arrived quickly and a nice monitor, my instruction booklet was in german which wasn't overly helpful, but will test out the monitor to see if it works nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Backhurst

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor (144hz through HDMI)
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a monitor with display port output and hdmi at 144hz, the monitor is perfect. I'm getting 144hz through HDMI via my laptop. As long as laptop output is HDMI 1.4 or higher you'll be able to get 144hz through HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: No speakers but it's too good matter
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the TN panel make it seem that the colours won't be great, this TN panel has insane horizontal viewing angles while the vertical aren't as great. The picture is great and clear but the brightness isn't as high as Id like but it's still good for a TN. The response time in games is great there's no smearing, ghosting or tearing even without vsync
customer_reviews.author: yukkii wizz

customer_reviews.title: I will post another review when it arrives
customer_reviews.text: It hasn't arrived yet but I can't wait for it, I have a feeling the 144hz refresh rate is amazing, no dead pixels, I mostly using for gaming and I think it will be amazing, the only one problem is that I have read reviews that it comes with a 60hz input hdmi cable so I have ordered a 144hz cable, it's arriving on the 14th of May, can't wait 😂😂🎉🎉
customer_reviews.author: callum dempsey

customer_reviews.title: it flickers and goes blurry after 10 mins of gaming
customer_reviews.text: DO NO BUY!!!!! the first time out of the box it was blurry. after 10 or 15 mins of it being on it started glitching out and going blank for about 20 seconds. it does this thing where half of your screen is just blank and it wont go back until you plug it out and back in again. overall not a good product. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Conor

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant all round
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product. I use this as my main monitor for gaming, I play games such as CSGO, overwatch, warzone, Valorant, apex and fortnite and it is brilliant for all of these. Would highly recommend, I have an nvidia rtx 2060 super and it allows G sync. Very happy with this item would strongly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bunn

customer_reviews.title: Good monitors
customer_reviews.text: Bougbt 2 of these monitors to eventually have a triple screen race setup. A little let down in the photos it looks like they have no bezels but they have a 3 mil border around the top and sides. Decided to keep them would be 5 stars if it wasn't for this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product very simple connections but the screen quality is great
customer_reviews.author: JAMES T.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent overall monitor.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great monitor in general, does everything it should. But I feel the colours next to my BenQ monitor lack a bit. But still a great all round monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: First Gaming Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Ideal monitor for FPS and Strategy Gaming Playing Overwatch feels and looks great - an easy transition from Xbox Gaming So simple and easy to setup - Took me 3 minutes to get up and running!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Charles Minchew

customer_reviews.title: The Monitor is Perfect For Gaming
customer_reviews.text: The OMEN Monitor has 244hz which is more than enough for gaming. However, to take advantage of the full experience you are going to need a very powerful PC. My pc runs big games like GTA 5 and Fortnite at over 300FPS so this monitor is just what I needed. I really appreciate this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Anca Mihaela Sava

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor, moved from playing on a TV to this and its incredible what a difference it makes, the 1ms response time, refresh rate and vividness of the colours is truely spectacular. I was second guessing it before purchasing but it's a brilliant choice.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: No built-in speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Product description mentioning 25x has built-in speakers and that was one of the reason I chose this one over other brands with bigger size screens. It turns out there are no built-in speakers! Feel cheated...
customer_reviews.author: burak o.

customer_reviews.title: Screen bright spots
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a week and bright spots are already starting to show. Pretty annoying. But decent monitor otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Boake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect monitor! Default settings are not so great for gaming but with some tweaking you can get an amazing picture quality. Well worth the price and recommend for those wanting a decent 244hz monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: My opinion
customer_reviews.text: Does the job works at the speed shown and well in my opinion cheaper than other monitors and f the same type so by all means it is good
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up nice design very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: good entertaining game;)

customer_reviews.title: This is a great moniter
customer_reviews.text: Great moniter for my first gaming moniter instead of on Xbox with a tv now on pc with this is so much nicer when you use 144hz against 60 it’s a much better felling highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Henry Searle

customer_reviews.title: Black screen every so often
customer_reviews.text: Our monitor turns to a black screen every couple minutes and seems faulty I wouldn’t recommend it if you’re not a risk taker and go for an official hip version :) overall good for gaming though
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good for price (just needs a few settings changed)
customer_reviews.text: Good quality screen plenty bright good for it's price. However it does need tweaking as factory settings leave the image on screen to be increadably blury
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Monitor stopped working only after a month of use, Ridiculous I’m so disappointed! Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale for £250 worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent faulty untested product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. As soon as its out the box, works for 39s then fades to white with yellow lines down the screen. Gutted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good monitor for cash
customer_reviews.text: i love the monitor felt so good to use and i’d definitely recommend given the fact that it’s under 200.
customer_reviews.author: Janu

customer_reviews.title: Performs good, looks food.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, good looking, working well, no issues so far, hope it stays like that for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent graphics
customer_reviews.text: Very good screen, love the ambient lighting, easy set up
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Cocozza

customer_reviews.title: Good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great monitor I’ve been using it for like 2 months but sadly it has randomly white screened of death on me and now waiting for a replacement sadly
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: No speakers
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is very pretty.. I just wish when purchasing it, the lack of speakers was a little more highlighted. Since now I have to buy some.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B

customer_reviews.title: Alright...
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice monitor fits perfectly on my desk but it keeps flickering and idk how to fix it i wouldnt buy it
customer_reviews.author: eabhann

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Bargain for a g sync monitor, only downside is that it doesnt quite stretch to the bezel leaving about a 5mm black border around the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Rymz

customer_reviews.title: Colour
customer_reviews.text: The screen has terrible colour saturation and is filled with botchy not formed colours do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.text: Colours and image quality is really good, and the freesync with the 144hz is unreal so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Castro

customer_reviews.title: only problem is dead pixels over time
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor, g sync works great however within the first month dead pixels seem to have appeared on my screen for no particular reason
customer_reviews.author: Deniz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Had no issues, screen refresh rate feels amazing and adjustable neck is great on the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Screen gets very warm after a few hours of continuous use other than that is great
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixel
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor, unfortunately has been delivered with a dead pixel.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor I have ever had. Freesync is amazing and works great with my 2070 super.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Not good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back as it wasnt clear enough or fast enough for quality gaming experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Product was decent but the screen was faulty and would distort every 15 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged and slowly deteriorated until it was unusable, poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good factory settings
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor. Good specs and build quality. Looks great and good Hz
customer_reviews.author: oscar.

customer_reviews.title: HP 24x better than on picture
customer_reviews.text: I like that there is actually fast response time and 144hz as advertised. The screen can be moved in all directions, that is up and down and even rotated 90 degrees to the left and 20/30 degrees front or back. Despite being TN panel the image quality is really good, the viewing angles arent an issue at all and the construction is sturdy and stable. Overall im happy with the purchase. HDMI cable included so no need to buy separately. To the marketing team you should change the wallpaper on the illustration photos because the one you used rather rejects than attracts due to it looking fuzzy and doesnt really show the screen potential
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

product_meta.title: HP OMEN X 25f 240 Hz Full HD Gaming Monitor (1920 x 1080) 1 ms, AMD Free-Sync, G-Sync Compatible (1 DP, 2 HDMI, 2 USB), Black
feature_bullets: 240 Hz Refresh Rate: With a whopping 240 Hz refresh rate, this display is 4x faster than traditional 60 Hz monitors
1 ms Response Time: Lets you respond to onscreen action before your opponent knows what hit them
Adaptive Sync: Eliminates troublesome stuttering by creating a direct link between the graphics card and the display; OMEN X 25f supports AMD FreeSync technology and is NVIDIA G-SYNC compatible
24.5 Inch Full HD Display: Be prepared for brilliant visuals and crisp images with the unforgettable quality of this stunning 24.5 Inch (62.23) Full HD (1920 x 1080) Display
Height Adjustable Stand: Comfort is optimised with an adjustable display that adapts to your ideal height and angle

specifications.Series: OMEN X Gaming Display with Adaptive Sync
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars587 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
